title: Ground News - Keine Entwarnung in Hochwassergebieten - mehr Regen erwartet
text:
Left Center Right
Bias Insights
Bias Insights Germany is experiencing ongoing flooding, with no signs of improvement and more rain expected. The situation in Dresden along the Elbe River is improving, with water being redirected and people and animals evacuated. The floodwaters in Germany are being redirected, evacuations are taking place, and the situation in Dresden is slowly improving.
Insights by Ground AI
Does this summary seem wrong? Share menu More

nordbayern.de No all-clear in flood areas - rain expected Dresden/Hanover - Even today, the flood situation in parts of Germany is likely to remain tense. A key question is how much rain falls.

12 hours ago · Germany Read Full Article Frankfurter Allgemeine Lean Right High Factuality No all-clear in flood areas Auch am Freitag dürfte die Hochwasserlage in Teilen Deutschlands angespannt bleiben. Eine zentrale Frage ist, wie viel Regen fällt. In einigen Regionen werden bis zu 40 Liter pro Quadratmeter innerhalb von 24 Stunden erwartet.
